Title: 10000 Hours
Writer: Ryllah Berico (screenplay), Keiko Aquino (screenplay), Neil Arce (story), Peter Serrano (story), Bela Padilla (story), Joyce Bernal (story)
Actors: Robin Padilla, Michael De Mesa, Alden Richards, Bela Padilla
Plot: A senator is forced to go on the run after killing a judge and fights to clear his name.
